thread.title: Solana ETFs Secure $2B AUM, Strengthen Market Stability | Phemex News
thread.title_full: Solana ETFs Secure $2B AUM, Strengthen Market Stability | Phemex News

author: Phemex News
title: Solana ETFs Secure $2B AUM, Strengthen Market Stability | Phemex News
text: Solana ETFs have accumulated $2 billion in assets under management by mid-December 2025, following recent U.S. regulatory approval. Despite market volatility, investor interest remains strong as major firms like Bitwise, 21Shares, Grayscale, and VanEck launch spot Solana ETFs. These products have enhanced Solana's liquidity and visibility, contributing to market stability during a turbulent period for the broader crypto market. Institutional support has further bolstered Solana's on-chain stability, with firms increasing their SOL holdings amid fluctuating market conditions. This influx of institutional investment underscores the growing confidence in Solana's long-term potential, even as the crypto market experiences significant volatility. SOL -8.74%
